entry.title: [GRA2][Webhosting] - ~userid access legacy feature removal
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jun 24, 08:30 - 09:30 UTC

Jun 13, 13:56 UTC
Update - The maintenance has been postponed and has been successfully rescheduled.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Web Hosting offer.

Start time : 24/06/2024 08:30 UTC
End time : 24/06/2024 09:30 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : We plan to remove the ~userid access legacy feature in June 2024.
All links with format http(s)://someovhdomain.tld/~userid will have to be replaced by http(s)://yourowndomain.tld or they will end up displaying a "Site not installed" error page.

Thank you for your understanding.

May 16, 06:22 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Web Hosting offer.

Start time : 17/06/2024 08:30 UTC
End time : 17/06/2024 09:30 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : We plan to remove the ~userid access legacy feature in June 2024.
All links with format http(s)://someovhdomain.tld/~userid will have to be replaced by http(s)://yourowndomain.tld or they will end up displaying a "Site not installed" error page.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [Switzerland][VoIP] - Interconnect issue
entry.content:
Jun 11, 07:39 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 11/06/2024 01:11 UTC
End time : 11/06/2024 05:15 UTC
Service impact : Services are working as they should be.
Root cause : During scheduled network maintenance, a temporary network outage occurred. After the network was restored, some servers were missing necessary routes. Measures have been implemented to prevent future occurrences.

Jun 11, 05:39 UTC
Update - We are continuing to monitor for any further issues.

Jun 11, 05:25 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Jun 11, 03:35 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 11/06/2024 01:11 UTC
Service impact : The VoIP interconnection with Switzerland is inaccessible, incoming and outgoing calls are unavailable.
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

entry.title: [RBX/GRA/SBG][Hosted Exchange] - Mailbox Access
entry.content:
Jun 6, 23:03 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 06/06/2024 22:30 UTC
End time : 06/06/2024 22:58 UTC
Service impact : The situation is back to normal, the service is running nominally.
Ex4.mail.ovh.net is again reachable for customers.
Root cause : It was due to a renewal certificate on every exchange servers .

Jun 6, 22:41 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Jun 6, 22:40 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 06/06/2024 22:30 UTC
Service impact : Mailbox access from OWA to ex4.mail.ovh.net might be unreachable.
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.
